title: Strengthening Systems Design Competencies: Immersive Experiences for a Sustainable Future: Applied Drama-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can express and analyze emotional conflicts arising from future sustainability scenarios using drama techniques.
Learners can present at least three alternative perspectives for solving sustainability issues through role-playing experiences.
Learners can restructure insights gained from team-based drama activities into workplace-applicable language and present them.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
